text: (since people will hear of your great name and your mighty hand and your outstretched arm), when they come and pray toward this house,
because he had an only daughter, about twelve years old, and she was dying. As he went, the crowds almost crushed him.
Jesus said to them, â€œIf God were your Father, you would love me, for I came from God and am here; I did not come on my own, but he sent me.
